AboutSindetiras.title: About Syndetiras
AboutSindetiras.paragraph1: Syndetiras is a small workshop of handmade silver jewelry, where each design is crafted with passion and close attention to detail.
AboutSindetiras.paragraph2: It is located in the small square of Agios Georgios, Zagora, Pelion.
AboutSindetiras.paragraph3: Anna — an interior decorator and silversmith — creates jewelry with clean, minimal lines.
quick_facts: Each piece of jewelry is unique

reviews.title: Kyriaki
reviews.review: I attended the workshop and was truly impressed! Anna was very approachable, explained everything in a simple and clear way, and helped us create our own silver piece of jewelry from scratch. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone who loves handmade craftsmanship and wants to learn something new.

reviews.title: Georgia
reviews.review: A great variety of designs with remarkable attention to detail. The staff is friendly and helps you find exactly what you’re looking for. The shop has a unique aesthetic, and every piece feels thoughtfully and lovingly made.
